channel.description: Recent content in Checkout on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Show details
item.description: Preconditions Connected and signed in FO Steps Add multiple products with different colors to your cart GO to Checkout page Expected result Verify all the informations are correct: Overall price Colors Amount Shipping costs

item.title: Add a promo code
item.description: Preconditions Having created a voucher in BO > Catalog > Discounts > Cart Rules Steps In FO, apply this voucher above the “proceed to checkout” button Expected result The amount of the voucher should be deducted to the product price.

item.title: Display of total (price, vouchers, shipping, promo...)
item.description: Preconditions In BO, having created vouchers (cart rules) by amount and % Connected and signed in FO Steps In FO, Add 2 products Paste the voucher by amount Paste the voucher by % \ Expected result Verify the overall amount is correct

item.title: Display of highlighted cart rules
item.description: Preconditions In BO, Go to Catalog>Discounts>Cart rules Switch Highlight to YES Create Cart rule Steps Add a product to your cart Check the vouchers is proposed ) Expected result The voucher should be presented as below
